column4: hello i got a problem of my ubuntu,sometimes when startup the system needs to check disk and asks me to press F to fix or I to ignore,if it checks, then reboot and it goes normal,this happens very frequently.what's wrong?
btw, last time when i used partionMagic,it said my extend partion didn't be marked as extended or something like that,it asked me to fix it,should i allow it to fix?
